channel.title: Llm on Arun
channel.description: Recent content in Llm on Arun

item.title: Jupyter to LLM Extractor
item.description: A Chrome extension that extracts content from Jupyter notebooks for more effective interactions with large language models

item.title: llmdirtree: Directory Visualization and Context Generator for LLM Workflows
item.description: A Python CLI tool that generates both directory trees and code context summaries optimized for LLM interactions
